Posts.Content: Hi I'm new to all of this. But I was wondering if anyone would help me out. I will be having surgery on Jan.5th. I will be having a double mastectomy with a TRAM flap...Is there anything I can do before or tips I should know for after the surgery..I cant help freaking out a little bit..I have 5 kids and 3 of them are under 10 I just need to know how long I will be down for the count..lol thanks so much:)
Posts.Title: Needs advise before surgery!
